message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $11,500. It's a great deal for you and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. I'm willing to pay that price for the product.
Bob, I understand your offer, but $10,500 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit, though. How about $11,000? It's a fair price that reflects the value of this product.
I'm getting close to my budget, but I think I can go a bit higher than $10,000. How about $10,250? I'm willing to meet you halfway.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $10,250 is still too low for me.  I'm happy to meet you halfway, but I need a little more than that.  How about $10,750? This is a fair compromise and lets us both walk away happy.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I can only go up to $10,500. Can you meet me at this price?
